LABEL: 0x64
STRING: Regret.

LABEL: 0x79
STRING: How did things turn out this way?

LABEL: 0xB6
STRING: Why did I act that way at that time?

LABEL: 0x1A8
STRING: We looked back to the past and blamed ourselves for the way things were.

LABEL: 0x1FF
STRING: Memories I didn't want to remember stuck to my chest like stakes, nailing me to the ground.

LABEL: 0x258
STRING: The abominable past. Many people told me to forget it as soon as possible,

LABEL: 0x29A
STRING: so I decided to forget... That was what I claimed.

LABEL: 0x2D6
STRING: The <SHEEP's> name was being forgotten by the world.

LABEL: 0x314
STRING: Once I'd forget about that incident, no one would ever speak of it.

LABEL: 0x36B
STRING: As long as I forgot, it never happened.

LABEL: 0x3A4
STRING: In reality, if I kept my mouth shut, I would quickly find that there was no one to speak up about it.

LABEL: 0x40B
STRING: Everything was back to normal.

LABEL: 0x42B
STRING: That was good.

LABEL: 0x544
STRING: Summer.

LABEL: 0x557
STRING: The sun hanging high in the sky beat down mercilessly on those of us in ROMLES uniforms.

LABEL: 0x5A8
STRING: Short-sleeved shirts and "summer clothes," however, weren't required and were considered optional.

LABEL: 0x605
STRING: In addition to the increased exposure of skin, the design wasn't very modern,

LABEL: 0x647
STRING: and there were few female staff members, including myself, who would wear them.

LABEL: 0x68B
STRING: I looked up at the sky from the bridge and heard the sound of steady footsteps approaching from behind me as I basked in the breeze.

LABEL: 0x6E0
STRING: Slip-resistant boots weren't ideal for producing clean footsteps,

LABEL: 0x734
STRING: but there was someone who could pull it off and gracefully stage his own entrance...

LABEL: 0x789
STRING: ...I knew of only one man who it could be.

LABEL: 0x7BD
STRING: 「In the middle of a break, are you?」

LABEL: 0x7E2
STRING: 「Can't you tell by looking? Do I look like I'm working?

LABEL: 0x81D
STRING: ...Argh, it's the same outside. This noise is unbearable.」

LABEL: 0x876
STRING: 「We're open to the public today. Isn't this much normal?

LABEL: 0x8AE
STRING: Isn't it good that people are interested in the sea?」

LABEL: 0x8F7
STRING: 「Okay, okay, I misspoke. Don't be so righteous.

LABEL: 0x943
STRING: Why don't you loosen up during your break?」

LABEL: 0x975
STRING: 「How about you stop talking like that during yours.」

LABEL: 0x9B8
STRING: 「Talking like what...? Hey, Momoi, what do you mean by that?」

LABEL: 0xA05
STRING: 「Haah. I should get back soon. What about you, Misasagi-san?」

LABEL: 0xA40
STRING: 「I'll stay here for a bit.」

LABEL: 0xA62
STRING: Misasagi waved his hand over his back without looking at me.

LABEL: 0xA96
STRING: I couldn't help but shake my head at his gesture with his pinky finger extended.

LABEL: 0xADF
STRING: From what I had heard, he was popular with the ladies in other departments,

LABEL: 0xB1B
STRING: but when I accompanied him during work I found him absolutely insufferable.

LABEL: 0xB5A
STRING: Well, he wasn't a bad person.

LABEL: 0xB85
STRING: In fact, I was quite fond of him.

LABEL: 0xBC5
STRING: Although he was several years older than me, he was the easiest to talk to among my colleagues.

LABEL: 0xC0E
STRING: Actually, he was the only one who patiently talked to me, as unsociable as I was.

LABEL: 0xC71
STRING: Still, how was he able to talk to me without getting bored?

LABEL: 0xCB0
STRING: It was slightly depressing, but I didn't hate it.

LABEL: 0xCE5
STRING: 「...He really is...」

LABEL: 0xD0F
STRING: I decided to leave Misasagi behind on the bridge.

LABEL: 0xD3B
STRING: I was carrying samples into the laboratory building under the blazing sun.

LABEL: 0xD74
STRING: Irregular instructions were flying from one place to another, as if they were preparing for a public experiment later on.

LABEL: 0xDDF
STRING: Even so, there were few people like Misasagi

LABEL: 0xE25
STRING: who could say that they didn't care about these open-house days,

LABEL: 0xE85
STRING: and the majority of the staff was in the spirit of entertaining the general public.

LABEL: 0xEDC
STRING: While there might be a political agenda to enhance the public image of ROMLES,

LABEL: 0xF30
STRING: many at the employee level, such as me, seemed to genuinely view the open-house days in a positive light.

LABEL: 0xFAD
STRING: The noisy voices of children.

LABEL: 0xFD2
STRING: I wondered if it was their mother at the receiving end of it.

LABEL: 0x1007
STRING: My workplace, now lively and unusually bustling, seemed like a different place altogether.

LABEL: 0x1054
STRING: That being said, a wide range of people were visiting, from elementary school children,

LABEL: 0x1098
STRING: to marine-loving students, to job hunters, to people who were way older than me.

LABEL: 0x10DC
STRING: Come to think of it, I used to be one of them...

LABEL: 0x1111
STRING: I wasn't sure how long it had been since...

LABEL: 0x1140
STRING: A friend of mine at the time took me here on an open-house day.

LABEL: 0x1179
STRING: I had no dreams, nothing special I wanted to do, and I was just going about my day-to-day life.

LABEL: 0x11C9
STRING: But, that day, I was struck by the endless romance of the sea I had seen at ROMLES.

LABEL: 0x120F
STRING: Tens of thousands of years of history.

LABEL: 0x1230
STRING: An unexplored ecosystem.

LABEL: 0x1257
STRING: A magnificent story about the sea, the mother of life, and a familiar existence――

LABEL: 0x12A4
STRING: I'd been feeling a sense of stagnation and frustration due to the lack of change in my daily life,

LABEL: 0x12EE
STRING: so that was an unprecedented shock to me.

LABEL: 0x131F
STRING: After seeing that, I decided that I wanted to work at ROMLES, and here I was.

LABEL: 0x1363
STRING: So no matter what Misasagi grumbled about, I bore no ill will toward these open-house days.

LABEL: 0x13B2
STRING: Some of these children may be awakened to the allure of the deep sea, just as I was that day.

LABEL: 0x141F
STRING: Even if not, leaving a good impression shouldn't be a bad thing in and of itself――

LABEL: 0x149A
STRING: At that moment.

LABEL: 0x14AF
STRING: I lost my balance and fell forward.

LABEL: 0x14E2
STRING: The moment I realized I had stumbled on something, it was too late.

LABEL: 0x152A
STRING: The samples scattered from my hands.

LABEL: 0x1559
STRING: With a vague sense of floating, my mind went blank.

LABEL: 0x1594
STRING: I found myself looking at the floor in front of me.

LABEL: 0x15BD
STRING: My hand, which was carrying the samples, wasn't there in time to shield me.

LABEL: 0x15F6
STRING: I prepared for a head-on collision and closed my eyes――

LABEL: 0x1638
STRING: 「...Guheh.」

LABEL: 0x1655
STRING: ...An unusual voice made its way out of my throat.

LABEL: 0x1688
STRING: It was no surprise.

LABEL: 0x16A7
STRING: Even though I expected to plunge face-first into the floor, it didn't happen.

LABEL: 0x1708
STRING: My lower body was completely stretched out, but my face was supported by something that had suddenly appeared in front of me.

LABEL: 0x176A
STRING: Was I saved?

LABEL: 0x178F
STRING: With my face cushioned, I thought.

LABEL: 0x17C0
STRING: If nothing had caught me and I had been lying on the floor,

LABEL: 0x17FE
STRING: I wouldn't have been spared from a bloody nose, internal bleeding, or bruises.

LABEL: 0x1843
STRING: Hmm... Was it correct to say that I was saved...?

LABEL: 0x1881
STRING: I thought about it calmly once more.

LABEL: 0x18A1
STRING: I considered my current posture.

LABEL: 0x18C2
STRING: I was stretched out like a shrimp, nearly bent over.

LABEL: 0x18FB
STRING: The shirt on my stomach was rolled up, and a chilly breeze caressed my navel.

LABEL: 0x1948
STRING: What the hell was I doing in the middle of a hallway like this――

LABEL: 0x19A4
STRING: 「Hiyaaaa!!」

LABEL: 0x19C9
STRING: 「Whoa.」

LABEL: 0x19E0
STRING: I pushed the cushion back with both hands and curled myself up.

LABEL: 0x1A18
STRING: I rolled over and ended up falling on my butt.

LABEL: 0x1A61
STRING: 「Ow, ow, ow...」

LABEL: 0x1A7F
STRING: 「Hey, you all right?」

LABEL: 0x1AA0
STRING: It was an unfamiliar male voice.

LABEL: 0x1AC5
STRING: Reasonably low and a bit burly, as if worn down by booze or cigarettes.

LABEL: 0x1B06
STRING: I looked up and there he was, standing right in front of me.

LABEL: 0x1B41
STRING: A man with a stubble, wearing a wrinkled doctor's coat.

LABEL: 0x1B89
STRING: He had unhealthily skinny cheeks resembling a deep moat.

LABEL: 0x1BBD
STRING: His grown-out hair, along with his stubble, made him look somewhat untidy.

LABEL: 0x1C0A
STRING: He then crouched down and extended his hand to me.

LABEL: 0x1C4E
STRING: 「I-I'll stand up on my own!」

LABEL: 0x1C77
STRING: I rushed to get up and dusted myself off.

LABEL: 0x1CA2
STRING: 「Your shirt...」

LABEL: 0x1CC5
STRING: 「I know! I'm fixing it right now, okay?!」

LABEL: 0x1D0A
STRING: 「Your knee. It's ripped.」

LABEL: 0x1D2B
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x1D41
STRING: The man pointed at my knee.

LABEL: 0x1D57
STRING: I followed his finger and saw that there was a tear on the sock on my right knee.

LABEL: 0x1DA4
STRING: I must have scraped it on the floor when I was shrimping earlier.

LABEL: 0x1DE0
STRING: Slowly, I could feel my scraped knee heat up.

LABEL: 0x1E17
STRING: 「See?」

LABEL: 0x1E49
STRING: The man pulled a handkerchief from the pocket of his doctor's coat and crouched at my feet.

LABEL: 0x1EA6
STRING: The skirt of my ROMLES uniform touched the man's bangs.

LABEL: 0x1EE0
STRING: 「Wait――」

LABEL: 0x1EFF
STRING: 「This'll only take a second. Don't move.」

LABEL: 0x1F28
STRING: What was I going to do if someone came――

LABEL: 0x1F59
STRING: I scurried around the kneeling man and surveyed my surroundings.

LABEL: 0x1F92
STRING: Okay, no sign of anyone for now.

LABEL: 0x1FBC
STRING: Why did I have to go through all this...?

LABEL: 0x1FF9
STRING: The man was crouching down in the middle of the hallway and looked anything but ashamed.

LABEL: 0x204C
STRING: He took out a handkerchief that had been meticulously ironed, a mismatch with his worn doctor's coat.

LABEL: 0x20B7
STRING: He opened it wide, folded it into a triangle, and wrapped it to cover the wound.

LABEL: 0x2116
STRING: 「There you go.」

LABEL: 0x213B
STRING: In no time at all, the man finished tying it into a knot, stood up, and――

LABEL: 0x21A2
STRING: What did he do to me just now?

LABEL: 0x21C6
STRING: 「If it hurts, come down to the infirmary later.」

LABEL: 0x21F9
STRING: The man said something to me from above and walked off.

LABEL: 0x223C
STRING: As I looked at him walk away, I froze, unable to move.

LABEL: 0x227D
STRING: Let's face it, I was confused.

LABEL: 0x22C2
STRING: 「Hey, Momoi-kun.」

LABEL: 0x22E1
STRING: 「Oh, ah, Misasagi-san...」

LABEL: 0x230A
STRING: 「What's the matter?」

LABEL: 0x2331
STRING: 「No, I mean, um...」

LABEL: 0x235A
STRING: 「Do you know that man just now?」

LABEL: 0x238B
STRING: 「Man?」

LABEL: 0x23A2
STRING: 「You know, that gloomy-looking ship's doctor.」

LABEL: 0x23D4
STRING: Gloomy-faced ship's doctor... The man just now.

LABEL: 0x23FB
STRING: There was no doubt about it.

LABEL: 0x2416
STRING: 「Right! That guy!

LABEL: 0x2439
STRING: Did you see what he just did to me?」

LABEL: 0x246E
STRING: 「...Well, he wrapped a handkerchief around your leg, didn't he?」

LABEL: 0x24A7
STRING: 「You're not wrong, but... that's not all!

LABEL: 0x24DB
STRING: That guy, after wrapping that thing around my knee,

LABEL: 0x250D
STRING: he smacked me on the head with his palm, like this!

LABEL: 0x254F
STRING: Why did he do that?!」

LABEL: 0x2572
STRING: 「...Are you jealous?」

LABEL: 0x2593
STRING: 「What?!」

LABEL: 0x25AF
STRING: What was this guy talking about?

LABEL: 0x25D7
STRING: Why couldn't he get the message... I held my head up.

LABEL: 0x2608
STRING: I was, you know, small.

LABEL: 0x262C
STRING: I was told that I was rather tiny, generally speaking.

LABEL: 0x2666
STRING: In addition, my face wasn't that mature, and I looked young for my age.

LABEL: 0x26B5
STRING: However, I didn't feel any complex about that.

LABEL: 0x26FB
STRING: I didn't, but...

LABEL: 0x2721
STRING: 「He was treating me like a kid!

LABEL: 0x2758
STRING: I'm sure he was this close to saying%Nsomething like, "You did well to not cry." Ah, damn it!」

LABEL: 0x27B9
STRING: 「C-Calm down, Momoi-kun. People will hear.」

LABEL: 0x27F2
STRING: I realized that my voice was getting louder and louder.

LABEL: 0x2829
STRING: Misasagi's face also had the look of "Oh, I've done it now."

LABEL: 0x2870
STRING: This wasn't good... I couldn't lose my cool like this.

LABEL: 0x28A8
STRING: 「S-Sorry.」

LABEL: 0x28C9
STRING: Picking up the samples scattered at my feet, I quickly left the place.

LABEL: 0x2911
STRING: Misasagi, walking by my side, eventually chuckled while holding his mouth.

LABEL: 0x2954
STRING: 「There's no need to laugh, is there...?」

LABEL: 0x2991
STRING: 「No, no. I might upset you by saying this, but I've never seen you show your emotions like that before.

LABEL: 0x2A0D
STRING: I was just relieved and found it age-appropriate and rather charming.」

LABEL: 0x2A64
STRING: What's with him talking like an old man?

LABEL: 0x2A9F
STRING: He was probably no older than Katagiri.

LABEL: 0x2AD0
STRING: 「Who was that man, anyway?

LABEL: 0x2B03
STRING: He's been around here lately.」

LABEL: 0x2B30
STRING: 「Ah... I don't know the details, but he arrived here recently. Apparently, he graduated from Imperial University.」

LABEL: 0x2B95
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x2BAB
STRING: Did that mean he was actually elite?

LABEL: 0x2BE7
STRING: That man who would wear a doctor's coat over a flimsy shirt like that?

LABEL: 0x2C3C
STRING: 「But he's not perfect elite, apparently.

LABEL: 0x2C7A
STRING: I heard that after graduating from Imperial University, he went straight to working at the university hospital, but for some reason he quit after a few years to work on disaster and remote area medicine.」

LABEL: 0x2CF1
STRING: 「What's that about...?」

LABEL: 0x2D16
STRING: 「I couldn't say. I don't know how much of that's true, but I hear he's good.

LABEL: 0x2D5A
STRING: He never gets involved with anyone in that way, and he doesn't want to talk about himself, so the truth is in the dark, you know?」

LABEL: 0x2DDB
STRING: A doctor who didn't want to talk about himself, was he?

LABEL: 0x2E0E
STRING: I had seen him around here, sure, but that was the first time I'd heard his voice.

LABEL: 0x2E6B
STRING: While we continued chatting, we reached the experiment building.

LABEL: 0x2EB0
STRING: Misasagi opened his mouth while we waited for the elevator.

LABEL: 0x2EE8
STRING: 「May I ask something?」

LABEL: 0x2F1F
STRING: 「Hm?」

LABEL: 0x2F36
STRING: 「Maybe I'm imagining things, but...」

LABEL: 0x2F69
STRING: 「Why do you always avoid looking at the sea?」

LABEL: 0x2FAC
STRING: 「Eh?」

LABEL: 0x2FC0
STRING: I was taken aback.

LABEL: 0x2FDD
STRING: The blue sea in my mind's eye.

LABEL: 0x3000
STRING: I could hear the sound of white waves.

LABEL: 0x3025
STRING: Bodies, sinking.

LABEL: 0x303E
STRING: A light in the distance.

LABEL: 0x30FA
STRING: I looked away from the blinding light pouring down from directly above me and looked down.

LABEL: 0x313B
STRING: Staring at the bottom of the pitch black sea.

LABEL: 0x3164
STRING: Deeper and deeper, I peered into it.

LABEL: 0x3193
STRING: The sound of the waves eventually faded, and all I could hear was...

LABEL: 0x31DA
STRING: ――Her voice.

LABEL: 0x31F8
STRING: 「..moi-kun! Momoi-kun!」

LABEL: 0x323A
STRING: 「The elevator's here.」

LABEL: 0x3263
STRING: 「Oh, sorry...」

LABEL: 0x328E
STRING: I quickly went inside.

LABEL: 0x32B0
STRING: 「Sorry for asking such a weird question.」

LABEL: 0x32DD
STRING: 「Don't worry about it...」

LABEL: 0x32F8
STRING: That was totally strange.

LABEL: 0x3319
STRING: Everyone forgot about that accident.

LABEL: 0x334E
STRING: Even though we had to forget about it...

LABEL: 0x3377
STRING: From the bottom of the sea, I could still hear her voice.

LABEL: 0x356F
STRING: Suddenly, those summer days came back to me.

LABEL: 0x35A6
STRING: The days the three of us had spent together.

LABEL: 0x35C8
STRING: We were selected for the <SHEEP> mission and spent every day training.

LABEL: 0x3612
STRING: The days of reading books and repeating simulations day in and day out

LABEL: 0x364A
STRING: to achieve the cutting-edge deep-sea exploration that I had dreamed of.

LABEL: 0x368B
STRING: However, those days had ended in the worst way possible――

LABEL: 0x36D5
STRING: Of the three people on board the <SHEEP>, I was the only one who was able to return to the surface safely.

LABEL: 0x372E
STRING: I was the only survivor――

LABEL: 0x3752
STRING: Since then, I'd been afraid of the sea.

LABEL: 0x377B
STRING: No, not just the sea.

LABEL: 0x37A0
STRING: I was afraid of water.

LABEL: 0x37BC
STRING: "Pools of water" evoked images of the past in me.

LABEL: 0x37F3
STRING: I hadn't taken a single bath since then and only took showers.

LABEL: 0x385F
STRING: 「...There's no one here. I wish it was always like this. I don't really fit in with those eccentric research people.」

LABEL: 0x38D2
STRING: 「Well, I understand how you feel. But more than that, we have the lab to ourselves.」

LABEL: 0x3929
STRING: I checked the schedule on the wall.

LABEL: 0x395B
STRING: Today, there was supposed to be a diving demonstration in the Kurama Bay area.

LABEL: 0x39A8
STRING: On top of that, it was open to the public.

LABEL: 0x39CA
STRING: In response, most of the staff, including researchers, were out of the office.

LABEL: 0x3A2D
STRING: I took out a culture petri dish.

LABEL: 0x3A54
STRING: Inside was experimental bacteria.

LABEL: 0x3A83
STRING: How utterly adorable, this bacteria.

LABEL: 0x3ABA
STRING: I put it under the microscope and looked into it.

LABEL: 0x3AFD
STRING: I noticed something strange.

LABEL: 0x3B24
STRING: 「What's this?」

LABEL: 0x3B41
STRING: 「Misasagi-san, look.」

LABEL: 0x3B65
STRING: Bacteria multiplied logarithmically.

LABEL: 0x3B90
STRING: They should increase without limit as time went by...

LABEL: 0x3BDB
STRING: 「Aren't there fewer than this morning? I'm not imagining it, am I? Or perhaps...」

LABEL: 0x3C4C
STRING: 「Yes...

LABEL: 0x3C5F
STRING: Suicide.」

LABEL: 0x3C77
STRING: Misasagi looked into the microscope, frowned, and curtly said that.

LABEL: 0x3CC6
STRING: 「Bacteria committing suicide?

LABEL: 0x3CE3
STRING: Are you joking? That's not funny at all.」

LABEL: 0x3D24
STRING: 「I'm serious... My jokes aren't well received, so I try not to tell them.」

LABEL: 0x3D83
STRING: Misasagi sighed and continued.

LABEL: 0x3DAF
STRING: 「Bacteria maintain the proper density for the nutrition they're given.

LABEL: 0x3DF7
STRING: So, if they have a limited amount of nutrients and multiply beyond that, the result is that none of the cells will get the nutrients they need, and they could be destroyed.

LABEL: 0x3E87
STRING: So, above a certain density, they release EDF molecules.」

LABEL: 0x3EC3
STRING: 「...Umm, EDF?」

LABEL: 0x3EE7
STRING: 「『Extracellular Death Factor――』」

LABEL: 0x3F28
STRING: He replied with excellent pronunciation as I asked.

LABEL: 0x3F72
STRING: 「When bacteria receive this signaling molecule, they sever their own messenger RNA and die by suicide.」

LABEL: 0x3FDA
STRING: 「How does such a thing happen in a simple lifeform like bacteria...?」

LABEL: 0x4029
STRING: 「The principles of life are universal. It makes no great difference whether it's bacteria or humans.」

LABEL: 0x4088
STRING: Bacteria that committed suicide in order to allow other cells to survive.

LABEL: 0x40C6
STRING: An instinct to sacrifice yourself for someone else.

LABEL: 0x40F6
STRING: That felt somewhat romantic to me.

LABEL: 0x412C
STRING: 「But whenever I talk to the students about this, they often misunderstand me and think, "So bacteria exhibit altruistic behavior, too."」

LABEL: 0x41A7
STRING: 「Hm? Is that wrong?」

LABEL: 0x41CE
STRING: Misasagi, who also gave lectures to students, thought back to that scene and looked away.

LABEL: 0x421D
STRING: 「What is selfish or altruistic? Bacteria, to be sure, behave in ways that are detrimental to themselves as individuals.

LABEL: 0x4293
STRING: But as a group, or as a species, they're also acting selfishly to ensure the survival of the greater number.

LABEL: 0x4307
STRING: Natural selection working on an individual or group level―that's an old debate.」

LABEL: 0x434D
STRING: For their own survival or that of their species.

LABEL: 0x43A0
STRING: Depending on the scale, what actions were beneficial would vary.

LABEL: 0x43E5
STRING: There were cases where the act of killing oneself was more selfish.

LABEL: 0x4430
STRING: 「Have you come to a conclusion?」

LABEL: 0x4459
STRING: 「...One thing I can tell you

LABEL: 0x447A
STRING: is that there are virtually no real-world%Ncases for acting in order to save a species.」

LABEL: 0x44DC
STRING: 「I thought the bacteria was a perfect example.」

LABEL: 0x4525
STRING: 「Do you know what the concept of inclusive fitness is?」

LABEL: 0x454C
STRING: Misasagi tried to make me understand for the sake of explaining.

LABEL: 0x4577
STRING: I felt like one of his students.

LABEL: 0x45BD
STRING: 「Well... Fitness is the number of offspring that an individual organism can leave for the next generation.」

LABEL: 0x4630
STRING: 「Exactly. Inclusive fitness extends that concept to the level of genes.

LABEL: 0x468C
STRING: In other words, the degree of fitness includes not only "one's own offspring" but also the number of individuals of the same genetic relation.

LABEL: 0x46F2
STRING: So, for example, inclusive fitness includes the number of children one's siblings leave behind and so forth.」

LABEL: 0x4747
STRING: 「...Why did they bother defining such an elaborate concept?」

LABEL: 0x47A0
STRING: 「Good question.」

LABEL: 0x47BC
STRING: Every concept is defined to describe some event.

LABEL: 0x4804
STRING: This "inclusive fitness" seemed to be one of those rather complicated ones.

LABEL: 0x4867
STRING: 「You can use inclusive fitness to answer the question about "altruism." In other words...

LABEL: 0x48BD
STRING: There are cases in which a certain isolated behavior appears, at first glance, to reduce one's fitness, but in the end, that behavior is part of one's inclusive fitness...

LABEL: 0x496B
STRING: There's this whole idea of multi-level selection.

LABEL: 0x49AD
STRING: Natural selection on a group level, rather than an individual level, can ultimately change the inclusive fitness of individuals.

LABEL: 0x4A1D
STRING: You then get organisms that, at first glance, appear to be "altruistic" or working for the "preservation of the species." But at its essence, it's very rational and selfish.」

LABEL: 0x4ABB
STRING: 「...I see.」

LABEL: 0x4ADA
STRING: 「If you don't understand, it's smarter to say that you don't.」

LABEL: 0x4B19
STRING: 「N-No, that's not what I...」

LABEL: 0x4B3C
STRING: Misasagi smiled.

LABEL: 0x4B5A
STRING: He shook his head and dismissed my doubts.

LABEL: 0x4B91
STRING: 「...The point is, "If it's a disadvantage to me, but it helps my family members, then it's rational."」

LABEL: 0x4C09
STRING: 「Well... it's an easy metaphor to understand.

LABEL: 0x4C3D
STRING: Nevertheless, it doesn't have to be a direct blood relative of any kind to give those benefits.

LABEL: 0x4C89
STRING: For example, you'd bring sweets to your neighbors when you move in, right? That way, when the time comes, your neighbors might be willing to help you with something.

LABEL: 0x4D0F
STRING: Although you're temporarily paying a cost, you're benefiting from the "community of neighbors." This is also an act of self-interest.」

LABEL: 0x4D96
STRING: 「...Sorry, but that doesn't strike a chord with me. I live in a dorm.」

LABEL: 0x4DE3
STRING: 「You'll understand when you're a little older.」

LABEL: 0x4E16
STRING: 「There you go treating me like a kid again――」

LABEL: 0x4E52
STRING: There was a thumping and rough knocking sound.

LABEL: 0x4E85
STRING: I turned to go see what it was and opened the door of the lab.

LABEL: 0x4EBC
STRING: 「Hmm? What is it?」

LABEL: 0x4EE1
STRING: The knocker was a little girl.

LABEL: 0x4F2F
STRING: I crouched down to listen... My mind went back to that man from earlier.

LABEL: 0x4F76
STRING: 「What's wrong? Are you lost?」

LABEL: 0x4FA1
STRING: 「Fueeh...」

LABEL: 0x4FBE
STRING: 「Fueeh...?」

LABEL: 0x4FDD
STRING: Was that the cry of a kitten?

LABEL: 0x500B
STRING: I had no idea what she was trying to tell me.

LABEL: 0x503B
STRING: 「...What is it?」

LABEL: 0x505C
STRING: 「This girl... she's crying.」

LABEL: 0x5091
STRING: 「Leave it to me.」

LABEL: 0x50AA
STRING: Saying that, Misasagi crouched down in front of the girl on my behalf.

LABEL: 0x50EF
STRING: He then gave her a fake smile.

LABEL: 0x512D
STRING: 「What's wrong? It's okay, just tell me what happened, okay?」

LABEL: 0x517E
STRING: 「Pool... fell into...*Hic*」

LABEL: 0x51AB
STRING: Her words were fragmented.

LABEL: 0x51CB
STRING: The image I got from them was――

LABEL: 0x51FC
STRING: 「Momoi-kun, this is――」

LABEL: 0x5221
STRING: 「Let's go!」

LABEL: 0x535D
STRING: We started running and headed for the experimental diving pool.

LABEL: 0x539E
STRING: It was a huge tank, at least 20 meters deep, used for training and experimentation in diving research.

LABEL: 0x53F2
STRING: My worst premonition came true.

LABEL: 0x5417
STRING: No way... There were three children inside the pool.

LABEL: 0x5454
STRING: 「How did this happen――」

LABEL: 0x5481
STRING: The circumstances could wait.

LABEL: 0x54A0
STRING: 「Misasagi-san, I'll――」

LABEL: 0x54DE
STRING: I can't...」

LABEL: 0x54FD
STRING: He looked pale.

LABEL: 0x5522
STRING: Right―even though there was a diving demonstration, he did not participate.

LABEL: 0x557C
STRING: His fatal weakness was that his knowledge was only good for lecturing students.

LABEL: 0x55C0
STRING: He couldn't swim at all.

LABEL: 0x55E6
STRING: 「I'm sorry...」

LABEL: 0x5605
STRING: 「...Misasagi-san, go to the infirmary.」

LABEL: 0x563A
STRING: 「Momoi-kun, even you can't――」

LABEL: 0x5665
STRING: 「Just go!」

LABEL: 0x5681
STRING: Before I lost my firm resolve――

LABEL: 0x56B2
STRING: I made up my mind and jumped into the pool.

LABEL: 0x56E1
STRING: It had been a long time since I'd felt being in water like this... Ever since the accident.

LABEL: 0x5722
STRING: My blouse stuck to my body and made me heavier.

LABEL: 0x575F
STRING: To begin with, I wasn't a very good swimmer.

LABEL: 0x5799
STRING: 「Come on! Over here!」

LABEL: 0x57BE
STRING: I went to grab the children while shouting.

LABEL: 0x57F3
STRING: It took nearly ten minutes to grab two of the kids and get them out.

LABEL: 0x5833
STRING: ...There was only one left.

LABEL: 0x5851
STRING: It was at that moment as I was swimming to the last child...

LABEL: 0x58B1
STRING: I almost screamed in pain.

LABEL: 0x58E4
STRING: My legs cramped up.

LABEL: 0x58FF
STRING: ――But, of course.

LABEL: 0x5919
STRING: I didn't know how long it'd been since I last swam.

LABEL: 0x5952
STRING: Naturally, my body had also weakened.

LABEL: 0x597B
STRING: I wasn't very good at holding my breath.

LABEL: 0x59A4
STRING: After taking up two of them, I was already at my limit.

LABEL: 0x59DE
STRING: Still, I was the only one who could help this child――

LABEL: 0x5A0C
STRING: ――Even though we weren't related by blood?

LABEL: 0x5A31
STRING: Multi-level selection.

LABEL: 0x5A5A
STRING: That didn't explain helping a stranger or someone you had no connection to and knew nothing about.

LABEL: 0x5AB7
STRING: But... it didn't matter.

LABEL: 0x5AE8
STRING: All of humanity had diverged from a single life form. We were connected.

LABEL: 0x5B2E
STRING: If as many as possible survived, so be it.

LABEL: 0x5B61
STRING: If one life could save many more, it was rational.

LABEL: 0x5B9B
STRING: I didn't care about the preservation of the species, or any of that minor stuff.

LABEL: 0x5BDA
STRING: I firmly grabbed hold of the drowning child.

LABEL: 0x5C09
STRING: It's all right. I'll save you――

LABEL: 0x5C33
STRING: However, despite my determination and thoughts, my consciousness gradually faded away.

LABEL: 0x5C7A
STRING: If I could just save her――

LABEL: 0x5CB1
STRING: Could I atone for my sins?

LABEL: 0x5CE1
STRING: I felt my body sinking to the bottom of the pool.

LABEL: 0x5D1A
STRING: Ah... She's calling out to me.

LABEL: 0x5D41
STRING: She was there, at the bottom of the deep sea, at the bottom of these dark waters.

LABEL: 0x5D7C
STRING: It was time for me, the only survivor, to join them――

LABEL: 0x5DD2
STRING: Then...

LABEL: 0x5DEB
STRING: In my fading consciousness...

LABEL: 0x5E0C
STRING: I felt powerful arms wrap around my body――

LABEL: 0x5F2E
STRING: I opened my eyes.

LABEL: 0x5F4B
STRING: My foggy consciousness recovered and my vision became clearer.

LABEL: 0x5F84
STRING: I looked up and was met with the face of a man with scrawny cheeks and a scruffy beard.

LABEL: 0x5FCB
STRING: Unlike before, his expression was stern.

LABEL: 0x5FFF
STRING: 「What do you think you're doing?!」

LABEL: 0x602E
STRING: 「I was trying... to... help...」

LABEL: 0x605B
STRING: 「If you die, there's nothing left! Don't throw away your own life!」

LABEL: 0x60AC
STRING: I was sure he was right... but it was frustrating that I couldn't say anything back.

LABEL: 0x60ED
STRING: I couldn't help but feel antagonistic toward his strong words...

LABEL: 0x6129
STRING: The man took a tablet from his pocket and threw it into his mouth.

LABEL: 0x6166
STRING: 「I'm glad you're safe...」

LABEL: 0x618B
STRING: Tap, tap. He tapped me on the forehead.

LABEL: 0x61B8
STRING: It had been a long time since someone had been this angry with me.

LABEL: 0x61FB
STRING: ――I'm sorry.

LABEL: 0x621C
STRING: I didn't say it out loud.

LABEL: 0x6241
STRING: I didn't know why... but his warm and angry voice reminded me of her.

LABEL: 0x62A1
STRING: ――It would be some time later that I'd learn the name Hiragino Sousuke.
